channel.title: threejs on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in threejs on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Cameras in ThreeJS
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: ThreeJS is a JavaScript 3D library that allows developers to develop and describe data in 3 dimensions, and then convert them into 2 dimensions and display them on HTML Canvas.
